casebody.data:
LIVONIA GATEWAY INVESTMENTS, LLC, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
BROOK PROPERTY HOLDING, LLC, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 159749
COA: 340439 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 21, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee to extend the time for filing its answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before July 20, 2019.
